Meters Squared – Hectares: 2208 Acre – Lot size (sq.Ft): .50 acres Year Built: 2009 Phone lines: 1 Cable TV: Satelite or Broadcast Internet Connection: ADSL 128/256 and more Added Security: Fence This gorgeous modern home is minutes from Palmares in a quiet neighborhood, has a great yard and beautiful architecture. The several nooks and corners make this home a work of art in itself. The home boasts an open living design, including the dining and kitchen areas which have huge sliding glass windows that open to the gardens and terrace. The high ceilings let in a lot of light throughout the house.
The kitchen features granite counter tops and several windows. There is also an ample pantry for food and small appliance storage. The living room has a custom made book shelf as well as great views to the garden. The covered porch is a great place for entertaining or enjoying the perfect Palmares weather.
This is a three story home with a limited number of stairs between floors. The second level has it’s own entrance, the laundry and storage area are also conveniently located here and the three bedrooms and a bathroom are at the end of the hall. The master bedroom is on the third floor and it features a gorgeous bathroom with a shower and tub as well as a walk in closet. The master bedroom is large and has a window sitting area built in that showcase the stunning view.
There is a chain link fence that surrounds the property and tropical plants are planted in the gardens but there is plenty of room for more gardens, a pool, or even a couple of guest houses.
Palmares is located about 30 minutes from the international airport and is known in Costa Rica as the city of friendship as the people here are exceptionally friendly. There are several grocery stores, lawyers, banks, healthcare professionals and restaurants located in town.
